short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is used to import product from Amazon to WordPress affiliate website using i2 AZON plugin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is used to import product from Amazon to WordPress affiliate website to use with i2 AZON plugin. Allow to add as many product as you want to your website to display their images and product features etc.
